Guided Cycling Tours

Our mission is to inspire people to a more sustainable way of thinking about transport and consumer mentality.

At Re-cycle you can explore Spains capital Madrid with our guided tours.

Contact us

About us

We are an ecofriendly non-profit organization that wants that more people use the bike as transport when they come visit our beautiful town. At Re-cycle we take in old bikes and fix them up for tourist to use when they come visit us. By donating a bike to us you will help making the world a better place!

Recycle-a-bike

Get free tour!
